name: Chromaline Prototype
description:
Chromaline demo Prototype 

Objective of the game is to collect the key, destroy enemies and reach the end and collect the chest to end the game. 

Click X for ranged attack

Click C when near a key to collect it

Click R when completed the game to restart 

Arrow keys for movement up to jump right to move right and left to move left 

Sourced assets:

Tileset can be found  Tile set found here:https://szadiart.itch.io/platformer-fantasy-set1

Floating key anim found here https://opengameart.org/content/flying-key-animated-64x64
